com.aliyun.odps.sql
Class Statement

java.lang.Object
  com.aliyun.odps.sql.Statement

public class Statement
extends Object

Statement用于执行ODPS SQL查询 

 Account account = new AliyunAccount("accessId", "accessKey");
 Odps odps = new Odps(account);
 odps.setDefaultProject("my_project");
 
 Statement stmt = new Statement(odps);
 QueryResult rs = stmt.execute("SELECT * FROM dual;");
 
 System.out.print("Inputs:" + rs.getInputRecords());
 System.out.print("Outputs:" + rs.getOutputRecords());
 
 RecordReader reader = rs.getRecordReader();
 Record r = null;
 while ((r = reader.read()) != null) {
     System.out.println(r.toString());
 }
SQL执行流程
  • 创建Statement对象: Statement stmt = new Statement(odps);
  • 执行SQL查询: QueryResult rs = stmt.execute("select * from xxx;");
  • 获取查询结果: rs.getRecordReader(); //如果是SELECT查询,可以直接读取查询结果
  • 获取查询的统计信息: rs.getOutputRecords();//SQL执行后输出的记录数
